column5: Spacious bedroom with queen size bed and private full bath, newly painted and updated on second floor (upstairs) in a beautifully decorated 1978 townhouse.   Room is themed in black, blue, and accent of white colors and mixed fabric, wood, and metal textures. It has a ceiling fan and a large window if you like natural light.  Private guest room suite size ~239.7 sq. ft.: bedroom (12' x 15'3\
